item.title: Electric Bike Tour of Bend & Deschutes River
item.description: Explore Bend and the Deschutes River with ease with this guided e-bike tour. With an electric bike to assist, you can go farther and see more with less effort, and with a guide, there’s no risk of getting lost. Ride through Bend, including the Old Mill District and lesser-known areas, while learning about the city and the river, with a stop along the way for snacks and beverages.

image.alt: Electric Bike Tour of Bend & Deschutes River

item.title: Chocolate Tour Including Hot Chocolate and Samples
item.description: You will enjoy a behind the scenes look at how this local award-winning chocolate maker creates their incredibly savory product. You’ll learn about how various beans from different regions of the world help make these chocolates and experience how the process works. Perhaps the highlight will be forming your own chocolate bar into a mold that will be packaged to take home with you. At the end, everyone will enjoy some wine or hot chocolate along with tasting their various samples. If you choose to purchase some chocolate bars, we have arranged special wholesale pricing for you.

image.alt: Chocolate Tour Including Hot Chocolate and Samples

item.title: Bend Oregon Guided Lava Tube Cave Tour
item.description:
Join us for an epic subterranean adventure deep below the Earth’s surface! Bend is home to a vast amount of lava tube cave networks, that were formed thousands of years ago by volcanic activity. During our two hours underground in the darkest, quietest spot the Earth can provide, our naturalist guides will impart their vast knowledge of the region's geology while we adventure through this incredible cave system. Wanderlust Tours is the only guide company permitted in these lava caves. These caves are wild caves, meaning there is no paved path or lighting. Wanderlust Tours will outfit your group with helmets and headlamps. We also recommend wearing hiking boots or sturdy shoes to help navigate the uneven, rocky terrain as well as a fleece jacket and jeans as the caves stay at 45 degrees Fahrenheit year round! These volcanically formed geologic wonders are a truly breathtaking place to explore!
** Please read through the "Additional Info" section for details about the caves difficulty.

image.alt: Bend Oregon Guided Lava Tube Cave Tour

item.title: Deschutes River Horse Ride
item.description: Explore the forests of Oregon on a relaxing horseback ride during this private experience near Bend. Sit atop your steed and travel along the Deschutes River towards Aspen Meadow for uninterrupted scenic views. On the way back, take a different route so you can experience even more of the area.

image.alt: Deschutes River Horse Ride

item.title: Cascade Lakes Kayak Tour in Bend Oregon
item.description: Our Cascade Lakes Kayak Tour is often regarded by guests as one of our best tours! As the sun shines above the mighty Cascade Mountains, we will push out onto the pristine waters of our high-elevation lakes and begin our kayaking adventure. Our award-winning Naturalist Guides will highlight the sweet spots on these stunning lakes that might not initially meet the eye, taking you into the fingers, coves, and bays that were formed by ancient volcanic activity and are only accessible by Kayak! Along with some fun in the sun, you will also learn about the region's geology - how fire and ice built and sculpted the lakes, mountains, and rivers in Central Oregon! If you'd like to take a refreshing dip, bring a swimsuit and remember to keep your eyes peeled for otters, osprey, and more. With crystal blue waters and incredible mountain views, our Cascade Lakes Kayak Tours are great for the whole family!

image.alt: Cascade Lakes Kayak Tour in Bend Oregon

item.title: Night Sky Private Photo Tour
item.description: Explore the high desert, and photograph the clear night sky on this private photo tour. This flexible tour starts at your preferred time and is limited to 1-2 people. Your guide is on hand to take you to the best locations and help with the proper camera settings for capturing the moment.

image.alt: Night Sky Private Photo Tour

item.title: The Ultimate Scavenger Bend! (Citywide)
item.description: Discover the best that Bend, Oregon has to offer in a fun way by participating in a scavenger hunt. Receive your clues and set off to explore several destinations around the city. Learn about the city while you hunt, stopping at local businesses, landmarks, and other points of interest. At the end of the game, claim your winnings and leave with newfound knowledge of Bend.

image.alt: The Ultimate Scavenger Bend! (Citywide)

item.title: Craft Brewery Tours with Complimentary Tasting Flights
item.description: Bend, Oregon is one of the most well known craft beer towns in this country. With over 35 craft breweries, the beer scene is a way of life around here. We will visit three of our favorite breweries in town, each with their own fun vibe. You will get a behind the scenes tour at one of the breweries, helping you understand the process of making craft beers. You will also enjoy several flight tastings, providing you plenty of beer to compare tasting notes from the different breweries. Join us for a great afternoon of touring, lots of tasting and hopefully making some new friends while enjoying the Bend beer scene like a local.

image.alt: Craft Brewery Tours with Complimentary Tasting Flights

item.title: Bend Team Trivia Hunt: New 2024 Mobile Game App!
item.description: A convenient way to see Bend, this Downtown Bend Scavenger Hunt and Trivia Game Walking Tour is ready to play when you are, can be paused whenever you want it to be, and usually just takes a few hours to get through. See sights of Bend as you play trivia-style riddles and find items for the scavenger hunt. Ideally played with up to four people, explore Bend on foot.

image.alt: Bend Team Trivia Hunt: New 2024 Mobile Game App!

item.title: Ultimate Scavenger Bend (Downtown)
item.description: Gain a different perspective on Downtown Bend with this fun and interactive scavenger hunt. Receive a set of 15 clues via email or text and choose to play the game whenever it suits your group. Walk around and see if you can find the destinations, which includes landmarks, businesses and other interesting locations.

image.alt: Ultimate Scavenger Bend (Downtown)

item.title: Food Truck and Brewery Tour with Complimentary Tastings
item.description: Bend is home to some 35 craft breweries, each with their own varieties of beer. Our food truck scene is also pretty spectacular with some tasty food. We will visit two of our favorite breweries as well as the liveliest food truck pod in town. You will enjoy complimentary flight tastings from the different breweries and Bend's famous Tots from the food truck pod. Enjoy a relaxing afternoon of craft beer and some tasty snacks.

image.alt: Food Truck and Brewery Tour with Complimentary Tastings

item.title: Electric Bike Rentals in Bend Oregon
item.description:
Experience Bend like never before - on the seat of an Electric Bike! You'll cover more ground than ever as you glide effortlessly through the sea of breweries, historic landmarks, and three optional route continuations for those looking for a longer ride! From the Deschutes River views at Drake Park to the eclectic shops in the Old Mill District, our e-bikes make it easier than ever to see the sights. Enjoy miles of quiet dedicated bike paths, away from cars, on this self-guided electric bike tour included FREE with half-day and full-day rentals.
NOTE: All electric bike riders must be at least 16 years of age.

image.alt: Electric Bike Rentals in Bend Oregon

item.title: Small-Group Paddle Board and Happy Hour in Cascade Lakes
item.description: Explore beautiful Cascade Lakes on a stand-up paddleboard with this small-group happy hour experience from Bend. Admire views of the snow-capped mountains while paddling around the lake. When you're ready to take a break, enjoy a dip in the lake, play a game of horseshoes, or relax in the provided beach chairs. Appetizers and beverages are included.

image.alt: Small-Group Paddle Board and Happy Hour in Cascade Lakes

item.title: Private Half-Day Photo Tours
item.description: Explore the stunning vistas and prime photo locations in Oregon’s high desert on this private half-day photo tour of Bend. In the company of your expert local guide, visit diverse wild and historic regions in and around Bend, get photographic guidance, and snap some memorable shots.

image.alt: Private Half-Day Photo Tours

item.title: Private Full-Day Photo Tours
item.description: Nurture your interest in photography while exploring the stunning high desert on this private half-or full-day photo tour of Central Oregon. In the company of your professional guide, visit diverse wild and historic regions in and around Bend, get photographic guidance, and snap shots of Oregon's unforgettable landscape.

image.alt: Private Full-Day Photo Tours

item.title: Sisters Team Trivia Hunt: New 2024 Mobile App!
item.description: While guided tours are usually helpful for getting oriented in a new place, they rely on guides and discourage independent exploration. With this interactive scavenger hunt and trivia game, you can explore the town of Sisters, Oregon at your own pace while solving trivia and riddles from your smartphone—and learning about the town’s pioneer history.

image.alt: Sisters Team Trivia Hunt: New 2024 Mobile App!

item.title: Guided Snowshoe Tour in Bend, Oregon
item.description:
Join us for a snow-filled adventure in the heart of the Deschutes National Forest! The cascade mountains that build Bend’s backdrop typically receive 400-600 inches of fluffy snow during the winter. With snowshoes on our feet, we will journey through an old-growth forest of hemlock and fir, splashing through powder and immersing ourselves in the winter wonderland of Central Oregon! During the adventure, your naturalist guide will highlight animal tracks we may come across, enliven you with stories of native history, and touch on the immense importance of a healthy snowpack to our local ecosystem.
Snowshoeing is truly the best way to observe nature in the winter! Traveling on snowshoes, you will be able to get a glimpse of how the native wildlife in Central Oregon have adapted to the deep snow, perhaps stumbling upon the tracks of a fox or pine marten. We will also take a quick rest to enjoy hot cocoa amidst the snow & mountains. Our Snowshoe tours are great fun for the whole family!

image.alt: Guided Snowshoe Tour in Bend, Oregon

item.title: Ultimate Scavenger Redmond, Oregon
item.description: Discover the highlights of Redmond, Oregon in a fun and interactive way on this scavenger hunt through the city. Grab your group and solve clues to find destinations and landmarks around the city. Learn about the local culture and history and interact with locals at businesses around town. Be sure to send in photos for a certificate and prizes.

image.alt: Ultimate Scavenger Redmond, Oregon

item.title: Murder Mystery Detective Experience in Bend OR
item.description:
Step into the shoes of a newly-minted detective, tasked by Commander Mahoney to solve a gripping case. murder on the streets of Bend.
Throughout this crime-solving audio adventure, visit each of the 10 mapped locations. You'll have the option to explore the downtown area using the Walking Map or follow a Driving Map on the city's outskirts. Once you choose, the exact starting point will be revealed. *See images for route
Park or stop at each location, listen to the audio story, and put your detective skills to the test by gathering clues and piecing together the evidence. Finally, make your deductions and issue an arrest warrant.
Your overall detective skills will be evaluated, culminating in a Case Performance Score to measure your sleuthing prowess. This game is suitable for solo detectives, dynamic duos, or groups of mystery enthusiasts, offering an immersive audio tale filled with intrigue.

image.alt: Murder Mystery Detective Experience in Bend OR

item.title: Surrey Cycle and Bike Rentals Experience in Bend
item.description: Wheel Fun Rentals in Bend is the perfect spot for FUN! Rent a Surrey and ride with your whole family along the scenic Deschutes River, or rent an electric bike to explore more of Bend without breaking a sweat. Bike locks, maps, and helmets are always offered FREE with rentals.

image.alt: Surrey Cycle and Bike Rentals Experience in Bend

item.title: Half-day Private Tour in Central Cascades with Photoshoot
item.description: Choose either to explore around Mt. Bachelor and drive up the Cascade Mountain Lakes Scenic Highway or the Three Sisters Mountains including Three Creeks Lake and views of Tam MacArthur Rim. Learn about the natural landscape with a local photographer by Central Oregon's best scenic view points and get 15-20 high quality edited photos to remember your time here and the picturesque Cascade Mountains.

image.alt: Half-day Private Tour in Central Cascades with Photoshoot

item.title: Bend Street Photography Private Tour
item.description: Explore Bend through the camera lens on this street photography tour. Your private photographer guide will meet you at your hotel or a central meeting point, ready to show you around downtown Bend and help you find great spots to photograph. You can even bring a friend along for free.

image.alt: Bend Street Photography Private Tour

item.title: Bend Adventure Photo Experience Get Captured in Central Oregon
item.description:
What sets our photo experience apart is the genuine and fun connection you'll make with a local Bendite eager to show you a fantastic time. We'll whisk you away to one of Central Oregon's most beautiful locations, capturing fun and stunning photos of you and your companions. With us, you're not just getting a photo session—you're gaining a memorable adventure filled with laughter and beautiful memories.
Your booking includes a one-hour photography shoot with edited high-resolution digital images. We provide written guides on preparing for your shoot and what to wear. Before the shoot, we'll have a phone call to discuss details and answer any questions you may have.
But that's not all! You'll receive an online photo gallery and product store, where you can view and purchase prints to create lasting memories. From start to finish, we're committed to making your photo experience fun, personalized, and unforgettable. Book with us today and let's create something beautiful together!

image.alt: Bend Adventure Photo Experience Get Captured in Central Oregon

item.title: 1.5 Hours Private Meditations with the Horses in Oregon
item.description: When was the last time you had the chance to get up close and personal and truly connect with a horse? They are always behind fences and belong to other people. In this session you will get the chance to connect with a horse and learn about their energy as well as your own.. They are great at offering feedback and with the expansive magnetic energy of their heart you instantly feel better in their presence. This is equine medicine for your soul.

image.alt: 1.5 Hours Private Meditations with the Horses in Oregon
